about_the_game:
Storm's Eye is a roguelite action game, in which the player takes on the role of a survivor trying to escape the hordes responsible for the fall of the Myalgar Empire.

Aboard a Sfar caravel, the emblematic vessels of the nomadic clans, become a Runner and complete a series of expeditions, alone or as part of a team, to help your caravel survive one more day in this threatened world by supplying and guiding it.

Plan your operations, discover the weak points of the creatures that will cross your path, find equipment and uncover the secrets of the desert that may enable you to defeat the endless horde.



Prepare for your expedition by choosing a class and customising the various items you can obtain in battle as you run. Survive the horde, outrun it across the desert, and set off with several runners to increase your chances of success !

  • 3 Playable Classes : Choose to play as the Spearman, the Archer or the Swordsman, each with different strengths and weaknesses.
  • More than 50 items : Hundreds of possible equipment combinations for a gameplay adapted to each new expedition.
  • In Coop-4 : Organise a multi-runner expedition and work on your class synergies, for more chaos and challenge.



Race through the arenas on an incremental difficulty scale until you die, and learn from your mistakes for your next expeditions. Use the lobby accessible between each race to take a breath, and gamble your bonuses in the hope of getting better ones.

  • Study your enemies : Each creature is unique. Find their weak points so you can kill them quickly and avoid being overwhelmed.
  • Collect your loot : If you kill enough enemies, you'll get valuable equipment to help you survive.
  • Hurry up : Complete secondary objectives for better loot on bosses, but be careful not to get killed or lose time !
  • Trough the Storm : The atmosphere itself is unstable. Ride through mists, storms and night and triumph over these conditions !



By completing challenges and achievements, unlock equipment and powers to take you further and further, and triumph on the leaderboard !

  • Challenges: Specific achievements in the game are rewarded by unlocking new content and equipment, so you can go further and personalise your games.
  • Leaderboard: Invite your friends to play and triumph together over adversity to earn a place on the scoreboard, and compare your game results !

short_description: As a Runner, master your environment and claw your way through the endless stream of corrupted monsters chasing you. Gear yourself up on the drops of your adversaries, recycle or upgrade it, and complete objective to move forward. But beware of the Storm !
